natspec.author: Bitcrush Devs

addToPool(uint256).details: Approve needs to be run beforehand so the transfer can succeed.
addToPool(uint256).notice: Add funds to pool directly, only applies funds to currentRound

params._amount: the amount of CRUSH to transfer from current account to current Round

buyTickets(uint32[],uint256).notice: Buy Tickets to participate in current round from a partner

params._partnerId: the id of the partner to send the funds to if 0, no partner is checked.
params._ticketNumbers: takes in an array of uint values as the ticket number to buy

claimAllPendingTickets((uint256,uint256,.details: _ticketIds and _matches have to be same length since they are matched 1-to-1
claimAllPendingTickets((uint256,uint256,.notice: Claim all tickets for selected Rounds

params._matches: array of match per ticket Id
params._rounds: the round info to look at
params._ticketIds: array of ticket Ids that will be claimed

constructor.details: Select the appropriate VRF Coordinator and LINK Token addresses

crushTheContract().details: This function is meant to retrieve funds in case of non usage and/or upgrading in the future.

editPartner(address,uint8).details: their ID doesn't change, nor is it removed once partnership ends.

params._partnerAddress: the address where funds will go to.
params._split: the negotiated split percentage. Value goes from 0 to 90.

endRound().details: WIP - the end of the round will always happen at set intervals

exchangeForTicket(uint32[]).notice: Exchange awarded tickets for the current round

params._ticketNumbers: array of numbers to add to the caller as tickets

firstStart().notice: Start of new Round. This function is only needed for the first round, next rounds will be automatically started once the winner number is received

getRoundDistribution(uint256).details: this is necessary since solidity doesn't return the nested array in a struct when calling the variable containing the struct
getRoundDistribution(uint256).notice: Get a specific round's distribution percentages

getRoundTickets(uint256).notice: Get Tickets for the caller for during a specific round

isNumberWinner(uint256,uint32).notice: Check if number is the winning number

params._round: Round the requested ticket belongs to

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

rewardTicket(address,uint256).notice: Give Redeemable Tickets to a particular user

params._rewardee: Address the tickets will be awarded to

setBonusCoin(address,uint256,uint256,uin.notice: Set the token that will be used as a Bonus for a particular round

setBurnThreshold(uint256).details: setting the minimum threshold as 0 will always burn, setting max as 50

setClaimerFee(uint256).details: Fee cannot be greater than noMatch percentage ( since noMatch percentage is the amount given out to nonWinners )

params._fee: the value of the new fee

setDistributionPercentages(uint256[]).details: we expect all values to sum 100 and that all items are given. The new distribution only applies to next roundsall values are in the one onehundreth percentile amount.expected order [ jackpot, match5, match4, match3, match2, match1, noMatch, burn]
setDistributionPercentages(uint256[]).notice: Set the distribution percentage amounts... all amounts must be given for this to work

setEndHours(uint8[]).details: adding a sorting algorithm would be nice but honestly we have too much going on to add that in. So help us out and add your times sorted

params._newTimes: Array of hours when Lottery will end

setTicketValue(uint256).details: Ticket value MUST BE IN WEI format, minimum is left as greater than 1 due to the deflationary nature of CRUSH

params._newValue: the new value of the ticket

ticketsToClaim().details: this is specific to UI, returns ID and ROUND number in order to make the necessary calculations.

togglePauseStatus().details: if the round is over and the lottery is unpaused then the round is started

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.
